name: Super Capacitator
overview: A homebrew multiscrolling platform game by José A. González (Jojo 073) with music by Ricardo Vieira. You drive Capacitartor on his mission to repair capacitors that are about to explode, you must look for them through several scenarios. The game is presented in 3 stages. 1-The base plate You must beware of virus infected discs, other malicious computer programs, bad cables and sharp elements. 2-Workbench Searching for programs infected by the virus so that they can continue to function properly. Watch out for the dangers. 3-The sea of acid The most dangerous place, where acid destroys the condensers. Rescue the cautious condensers and destroy the evil that is right behind this attempt to destroy the Amiga universe.
